VCS |S:

VERIFICATION REPORT. ves version 3

4 VERIFICATION FINDINGS

4.1 Project Implementation Status

Bureau Veritas Certification has performed an on-site visit and found that the Project has been put into operation and the electricity generated is supplied to NEPG according to the signed Power Purchase Agreement (PPA) "7, 25 sets of WTGs (Model of Vestas V80-2000kW '"*!) with a unit capacity of 2MW, providing a total installed capacity of 5S0MW as described in the registered PDD have been in operation.

According to the implementation log of the Project "3 the Project has been commissioning since 02/12/2008.

No notification or approval of changes has been requested before for the Project. During the site visit, no changes from the project activity as described in the VCS-PDD, VCS-MR and registered CDM-PDD have been observed or identified. Hence there is no need to request for notification or approval of changes.

This is the first verification and there are no open issues from the validation report.

Information provided in the monitoring report is in accordance with that stated in the VCS-PD and CDM- PDD. Further analysis of monitored parameters as reported in the monitoring report compared to those estimated in the CDM-PDD is developed in section 4.2 of this report.
